page.title: 14"FARMFAX" Computers
page.content: "Farmfax" is a small company started by Geoffrey Patterson dealing in micro computers.A Mr D.Ryder owned a 6 acre site in Steep Marsh,and ran a poultry business there, but recently sold out to H.H.Ltd. He joined Patterson & they set up the micro business in a corner of the original site."Farmfax" deals mainly in business applications, and much of the day to day work involves training the salesforce. 6 people work for Farmfax altogether.2 are full time and work in Steep Marsh,and another 4 work on the road as salesmen working on a commission basis.They deal with many makes of computers - Thorn,JVC, Canon,Sony,Dragon,Yamaha,Mitsubishi. Their sales net stretches nationwide,& though all business applications can be catered for,they tend to specialise in agricultural software.Farmfax also have an office in Petersfield.
